content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Sunset District to Alamo Square: 17.
Sunset District to Russian Hill: 24.
Sunset District to Presidio: 16.
Sunset District to Financial District: 30.
Alamo Square to Sunset District: 16.
Alamo Square to Russian Hill: 13.
Alamo Square to Presidio: 18.
Alamo Square to Financial District: 17.
Russian Hill to Sunset District: 23.
Russian Hill to Alamo Square: 15.
Russian Hill to Presidio: 14.
Russian Hill to Financial District: 11.
Presidio to Sunset District: 15.
Presidio to Alamo Square: 18.
Presidio to Russian Hill: 14.
Presidio to Financial District: 23.
Financial District to Sunset District: 31.
Financial District to Alamo Square: 17.
Financial District to Russian Hill: 10.
Financial District to Presidio: 22.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Sunset District at 9:00AM. Kevin will be at Alamo Square from 8:15AM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Kevin for a minimum of 75 minutes. Kimberly will be at Russian Hill from 8:45AM to 12:30PM. You'd like to meet Kimberly for a minimum of 30 minutes. Joseph will be at Presidio from 6:30PM to 7:15PM. You'd like to meet Joseph for a minimum of 45 minutes. Thomas will be at Financial District from 7:00PM to 9:45PM. You'd like to meet Thomas for a minimum of 45 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.

SOLUTION:  
The optimal schedule allows you to meet all four friends while respecting the minimum meeting times, availability constraints, and travel times. You start at Sunset District at 9:00 AM. The itinerary is as follows:  
- First, travel to Alamo Square (17 minutes) to meet Kevin. Arrive at 9:17 AM and meet for the minimum 75 minutes, ending at 10:32 AM.  
- Next, travel to Russian Hill (13 minutes) to meet Kimberly. Arrive at 10:45 AM and meet for the minimum 30 minutes, ending at 11:15 AM. Kimberly is available until 12:30 PM, so this meeting is within her window.  
- After Kimberly, you have free time until the evening. From Russian Hill, travel to Presidio (14 minutes) to meet Joseph. Arrive at 6:30 PM (after leaving Russian Hill at 6:16 PM) and meet for exactly 45 minutes, as Joseph's availability is fixed from 6:30 PM to 7:15 PM.  
- Finally, travel to Financial District (23 minutes) to meet Thomas. Arrive at 7:38 PM (after leaving Presidio at 7:15 PM) and meet for the minimum 45 minutes, ending at 8:23 PM. Thomas is available until 9:45 PM, so this meeting is within his window.  

This schedule ensures all minimum meeting times are met, all friends are visited within their availability, and travel times are accounted for. The itinerary in JSON format includes only the meeting actions as specified.

{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "Kevin", "start_time": "9:17 AM", "end_time": "10:32 AM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Kimberly", "start_time": "10:45 AM", "end_time": "11:15 AM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Joseph", "start_time": "6:30 PM", "end_time": "7:15 PM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Thomas", "start_time": "7:38 PM", "end_time": "8:23 PM"}]}
